title: Small Achievable Goals
overview: When odd couple Julie and Kris are forced to work together to produce a podcast, they learn they are both undergoing "The Change" – aka menopause – and embark on a journey of transformation, helping each other through workplace challenges and office politics, dating and relationship drama, and some serious health concerns. Like a phoenix from the ashes, they will be reborn as sexy, silver-haired, wizard women! Or at least wiser, less sweaty versions of themselves...
